triplets: Watercraft propelled primarily by sails using wind power
Recreation, racing, cruising, fishing, transportation, and sport
Fiberglass, wood, aluminum, carbon fiber, sails, ropes, and metal fittings
Hull, mast, sails, rudder, keel, rigging, and cockpit
White hull common; sails often white or colored with logos
Maritime recreation, sailing clubs, and nautical transportation
Boat builders like Beneteau, Jeanneau, Hunter, Catalina, and custom boatyards
Small sailboats 3–8 meters; cruising sailboats 8–15 meters
Approximately 500–5000 kg depending on size and materials
20–50 years with proper maintenance and care
